form.label: ATT&CK Matrix
form.description: This dashboard provides an overview of available correlation searches that match MITRE ATT&CK techniques. Darker colors indicate higher ratio of enabled rules and you can view the actual numbers when hovering over the cells and click to drilldown further for editing the rules.

input.label: Matrix Display Scope
input.choice: User-Defined and MITRE ATTACK App Rules

table.title: MITRE ATT&CK Compliance Lookup Gen Status

search.query: | rest /services/saved/searches/ | search title="MITRE ATT&CK Compliance Lookup Gen" splunk_server = local | fields title, next_scheduled_time, updated | rename title as "Lookup Generator Name", next_scheduled_time as "Next Scheduled Run", updated as "Last Scheduled Run" | join "Lookup Generator Name" type=left [| rest /services/data/lookup-table-files | search title = "mitre_all_rule_compliance_lookup.csv" | fields title, updated | rename title as "Lookup Table Name", updated as "Time of Latest Lookup Table Update" | eval "Lookup Generator Name" = "MITRE ATT&CK Compliance Lookup Gen" ] | fillnull value="" | eval Instruction=if('Lookup Table Name'="","Lookup table is empty, CLICK HERE to manually run the report and populate the lookup file.","If you want to REFRESH the below table you need CLICK HERE to manually run the setup and repopulate the lookup file.")

| inputlookup $tok_display_option$ | foreach TA00* [| lookup mitre_tt_lookup technique_id as <<FIELD>> OUTPUTNEW technique_name as <<FIELD>>_technique_name | eval <<FIELD>>_technique_name=mvindex(<<FIELD>>_technique_name,0) | lookup $tok_display_scope$ technique_id as <<FIELD>> OUTPUTNEW enabled_percentage as <<FIELD>>_perc, count as <<FIELD>>_count, enabled_count as <<FIELD>>_enabled | fillnull value="NULL" <<FIELD>>,<<FIELD>>_technique_name,<<FIELD>>_perc,<<FIELD>>_count,<<FIELD>>_enabled | eval <<FIELD>>_count=if("$tok_display_rule_status$"=="only_enabled_rules", <<FIELD>>_enabled,<<FIELD>>_count), <<FIELD>>_perc=if("$tok_display_rule_status$"=="only_enabled_rules" AND <<FIELD>>_perc!="NULL" AND <<FIELD>>_perc!=0,100, <<FIELD>>_perc) | eval <<FIELD>>_perc=if("$tok_display_rule_status$"=="only_enabled_rules" AND <<FIELD>>_perc="0" ,"NULL", <<FIELD>>_perc) | eval <<FIELD>>=<<FIELD>>."|".<<FIELD>>_technique_name."|".<<FIELD>>_perc."|".<<FIELD>>_enabled."|".<<FIELD>>_count] | fields TA0043,TA0042,TA0001,TA0002,TA0003,TA0004,TA0005,TA0006,TA0007,TA0008,TA0009,TA0011,TA0010,TA0040 | rename TA0043 as "Reconnaissance", TA0042 as "Resource Development", TA0001 as "Initial Access", TA0002 as "Execution", TA0003 as "Persistence", TA0004 as "Privilege Escalation", TA0005 as "Defense Evasion", TA0006 as "Credential Access", TA0007 as "Discovery", TA0008 as "Lateral Movement", TA0009 as "Collection", TA0011 as "Command and Control", TA0010 as "Exfiltration", TA0040 as "Impact"
